name: Jump in the line
description:
Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 51.

You're a cube, rolling along. Things happen every ten seconds, some more noticeable than others.

MUSIC:

Gyorgy Ligeti - Etude No. 13 "L'escalier du diable"

Gyorgy Ligeti - Musica ricercata No. 7

Pierre-Laurent Aimard - Piano

CONTROLS:

W - Roll Forward

Spacebar - Jump

Q/E - Zoom In/Out

Esc - Pause

Ludum Dare Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/$298288
